topic.title: <ListItemTemplate>
topic.p: <ListItemTemplate/> derives from GuiTemplate. It has the following properties additional to its base class:

topic.title: Selected
topic.p: This property is assigned by the list control. When the item is selected, this property becomes true. When the item is unselected, this property becomes false.

topic.title: Index
topic.p: This property is assigned by the list control. The number is the position of this item in the list control. The Index of the first item is 0.
This property could be changed when items before this item are inserted to or removed from the list control.
